ì„¤ì¹˜ê°€ ì™„ë£Œëœë‹¤ë©´ ì•„ë˜ ëª…ë ¹ì–´ë¥¼ ì‹¤í–‰í•´ì„œ ë°°í¬ë¥¼ í•´ì¤€ë‹¤.

Token ì´ ìƒì„±ë˜ë©´ ì´ˆë¡ìƒ‰ ë¶€ë¶„ì— key ê°€ ë‚˜ì˜¬ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ì´ë¥¼ ë³µì‚¬í•´ë‘ì!

ì—¬ê¸°ì— New repository secret ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ ì•„ê¹Œ ë³µì‚¬í•œ ë‚´ìš©ì„ Value ì— ë„£ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.
Name ì—ëŠ” GITBLOG ë¼ê³  ì‘ì„±í–ˆë‹¤.(ì´ë¦„ì€ ììœ )

ğŸš€ã€€New workflow

ì´ì œ ìƒˆë¡œìš´ workflow ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•´ì„œ ë°°í¬ë¥¼ ìë™í™”ì‹œí‚¤ë©´ ëì´ë‹¤!
Repositoryì— Actionsë¥¼ ëˆ„ë¥´ë©´ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì€ í™”ë©´ì´ ë‚˜ì˜¬ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤.
ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ New workflowë¥¼ í´ë¦­í•˜ê³ , set up a workflow yourselfë¥¼ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì¤€ë‹¤.

ê·¸ëŸ¼ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì€ í™”ë©´ì´ ë‚˜ì˜¤ëŠ”ë° ì•„ë˜ë¡œ ëŒ€ì²´í•´ì£¼ê³  Start Commitì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì¤€ë‹¤.
ì—¬ê¸°ë„ ë™ì¼í•˜ê²Œ masterì™€ mainì„ êµ¬ë¶„í•´ì„œ ì‘ì„±í•´ì¤€ë‹¤!

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - gh-pages
name: build gatsby
jobs:
  build_gatsby:
    name: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v1

      - name: Setup Node
        uses: actions/setup-node@v1
        with:
          node-version: '14.x'
      - name: Cache node_modules
        uses: actions/cache@v1
        with:
          path: node_modules
          key: ${{runner.OS}}-build-${{hashFiles('**/yarn.lock')}}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.OS }}-build-${{ runner.OS }}-
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: yarn install --prod --pure-lockfile

      - name: npm install fs-extra
        run : npm install fs-extra

      - name: Build
        run: yarn build --prefix-paths
        env:
          NODE_ENV: production

      - uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v2
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.EEYHWJ }}
          PUBLISH_BRANCH: master
          PUBLISH_DIR: 'public/'

ğŸ“ã€€New Post

ëª¨ë“  ê³¼ì •ì„ ì™„ë£Œ í–ˆìœ¼ë‹ˆ VS Codeë¡œ ëŒì•„ì™€ì„œ í„°ë¯¸ë„ì— npm run postë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ë³´ì!
categoryë¥¼ ì„¤ì •í•˜ê³  ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ê¸€ì„ ì‘ì„±í•´ë³´ì!

ê¸€ì„ ë‹¤ ì‘ì„±í–ˆìœ¼ë©´ ì•„ë˜ êµ¬ë¬¸ì„ í„°ë¯¸ë„ì— ì…ë ¥í•´ë³´ì!

ë‹¤ ì…ë ¥í–ˆë‹¤ë©´ Repository Actionsì—ì„œ ìƒˆë¡œìš´ workflowê°€ ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸í•´ë³´ì!

ğŸ“ã€€Google Search Console

ê²€ìƒ‰ ì—”ì§„ ë…¸ì¶œ

Gatsby Blog

ê·¸ë ‡ê²Œ ì”ë””ì‹¬ê¸°ì™€ ì™¸ë¶€ì— ë…¸ì¶œì´ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ ë¸”ë¡œê·¸ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ë³´ê¸°ë¡œ í–ˆë‹¤.

Gatsby ì„¤ì¹˜

ì•„ë˜ my-blog-starter ëŠ” ë³¸ì¸ì˜ ì·¨í–¥ëŒ€ë¡œ ë³€ê²½í•´ì¤˜ë„ ë¬´ê´€í•˜ë‹¤!

ğŸš€ã€€Visual Studio Code ì—°ê²°

    (ì•ìœ¼ë¡œ ëª¨ë“  í„°ë¯¸ë„ ëª…ë ¹ì–´ëŠ” VS Code í„°ë¯¸ë„ì—ì„œ ì…ë ¥í•´ì¤€ë‹¤.)

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Getting Started ğŸ˜ 1. Create a Gatsby site. If you are not using , following Gatsby Getting Started 2. Start developing. 3. Add your contentâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Getting Started ğŸ˜

1. Create a Gatsby site.

# create a new Gatsby site using the blog starter
$ npx gatsby new my-blog-starter https://github.com/JaeYeopHan/gatsby-starter-bee

If you are not using npx, following Gatsby Getting Started

$ npm install -g gatsby-cli
$ gatsby new my-blog-starter https://github.com/JaeYeopHan/gatsby-starter-bee

2. Start developing.

$ cd my-blog-starter/
$ npm start
# open localhost:8000

3. Add your content

You can writeâ€¦

  • contents to blog in content/blog directory.
  • resume content/__about directory.

With markdown syntax and some meta data

Support script for creating new post

$ npm run post

4. Fix meta data

You can fix meta data of blog in /gatsby-meta-config.js file.

5. Publish with netlify

ğŸ’¡ if you want to deploy github pages, add following script to package.json

"scripts": {
    "deploy": "gatsby build && gh-pages -d public -b master -r 'git@github.com:${your github id}/${github page name}.github.io.git'"
}

:memo: Write a post!

content
â”œâ”€â”€ __about
â””â”€â”€ blog
  • You can register your resume on the web. (in __about directory)
  • You can register your post. (in blog directory)

ğŸ§ Customize!

Gatsby config

/root
â”œâ”€â”€ gatsby-browser.js // font, polyfill, onClientRender ...
â”œâ”€â”€ gatsby-config.js // Gatsby config
â”œâ”€â”€ gatsby-meta-config.js // Template meta config
â””â”€â”€ gatsby-node.js // Gatsby Node config

Structure

src
â”œâ”€â”€ components // Just component with styling
â”œâ”€â”€ layout // home, post layout
â”œâ”€â”€ pages // routing except post: /(home), /about
â”œâ”€â”€ styles
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ code.scss
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ dark-theme.scss
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ light-theme.scss
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ variables.scss
â””â”€â”€ templates
    â”œâ”€â”€ blog-post.js
    â””â”€â”€ home.js

Style

You can customize color in src/styles directory.

src/styles
â”œâ”€â”€ code.scss
â”œâ”€â”€ dark-theme.scss
â”œâ”€â”€ light-theme.scss
â””â”€â”€ variables.scss

Welcome to gatsby-starter-bee! Happy blogging! ğŸ‘»
